metadata.description: Required. Name for the Jumpbox VM
Required. Name for the Jumpbox VM
Required. CustomerId value of Log Analytics. This value is referenced in MMA Extension
Required. WorkspaceKey value of OMS. This value is referenced in OMS VM Extension
Required. Artifacts storage account Key. Storage account that contains output parameters and common scripts
Required. Artifacts storage account Name.
Optional. AKV URI
Optional. AKV Resource Id
Optional. Jumpbox AKV encryption key
Required. Shared services Virtual Network resource Id
Required. Jumpbox ASG resource identifier
Required. Name of Shared Services Subnet, this name is used to get the SubnetId
Required. The username used to establish jumpbox VMs.
Required. The password given to the admin user.
Optional. Number of jumpbox VMs to be created.
Required. Size of the jumpbox VMs.
Required. OS image used for the jumpbox VMs.
Optional. Number of linux jumpbox VMs to be created.
Required. Size of the jumpbox VMs.
Required. OS image used for the jumpbox VMs.
Required. Diagnostic Storage Account name
Required. Diagnostic Storage Account SAS token
The Resource Group the Jumpbox resources were deployed to.
An Array of Names of the Windows Virtual Machines deployed.
An Array of Resource Ids of the Windows Virtual Machines deployed.
An Array of Names of the Linux Virtual Machines deployed.
An Array of Resource Ids of the Windows Virtual Machines deployed.
